column4: WHAT THE.. guys, all of the sudden my panels went crazy, kept reappearing and disappearing, and now i have no panel anymore.. not even when i run gnome-panel.
what did you install or uninstall before this started happening?
Nothing. I just.. clicked a youtube video
Okay, i tried killing X, and removing some files in /tmp. I had a panel again, but it started disappearing and reappearing again. What's causing that?
